org.apache.spark

Interface Logging

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ALS, AsyncRDDActions, BinaryClassificationMetrics, CoGroupedRDD, ConstantInputDStream, DataValidators, DecisionTree, DoubleRDDFunctions, DStream, GeneralizedLinearAlgorithm, GradientDescent, HadoopRDD, InputDStream, InputFormatInfo, JdbcRDD, JobLogger, KMeans, KryoSerializer, LassoWithSGD, LBFGS, LinearRegressionWithSGD, LogisticRegressionWithSGD, NaiveBayes, NewHadoopRDD, Node, OrderedRDDFunctions, PairRDDFunctions, PartitionPruningRDD, RDD, ReceiverInputDStream, RidgeRegressionWithSGD, RowMatrix, SchemaRDD, SequenceFileRDDFunctions, ShuffledRDD, SparkConf, SparkContext, SparkEnv, StatsReportListener, StreamingContext, SVMWithSGD, UnionRDD

    public interface Logging
    :: DeveloperApi :: Utility trait for classes that want to log data. Creates a SLF4J logger for the class and allows logging messages at different levels using methods that only evaluate parameters lazily if the log level is enabled.

    NOTE: DO NOT USE this class outside of Spark. It is intended as an internal utility. This will likely be changed or removed in future releases.
